content: That's really helpful, thanks. I'll definitely make sure to follow those tips. I was worried that I'd have to take a break from dancing after twisting my ankle, but luckily it was just a minor sprain. I've been trying to focus on my technique, especially in Salsa class on Mondays, to avoid any future injuries. Do you have any specific tips for preventing ankle sprains in high-impact dance styles like Salsa?
